    public class UiWidgetFileFieldGwt
extends AbstractUiWidgetFileField<UiWidgetAdapterGwtFileField>
    This is the implementation of UiWidgetFileField using GWT based on UiWidgetAdapterGwtFileField.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • createWidgetAdapter

        protected UiWidgetAdapterGwtFileField createWidgetAdapter()
        This method creates the widget adapter.
        This design is done to give more flexibility by overriding and also for lazy initialization of the widget.
        Specified by:
        createWidgetAdapter in class AbstractUiWidgetNative<UiWidgetAdapterGwtFileField,FileItem>
        Returns:
        a new instance of the underlying widget.
